text:
@LeighStewy #COVID #coronavirus 

Uhm... 

Vitamin C is part of treatment protocol for COVID-19. 

Particularly for patients whose bodies for some reason cannot tolerate the commonly used anti-virals 🤦🏻‍♀️

Everyone, take Vitamin C.
